description: Try our easy to follow Garlicky Prawn & Sherry Tapas recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
name: Garlicky Prawn & Sherry Tapas Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 1 handful flat leaf parsley, chopped (to garnish)

recipeInstructions.text: Heat the oil in a frying pan. Add the garlic followed by the prawns. Cook for 3 minutes, turning once, until golden. Pour over the sherry and let it bubble for 1-2 minutes. Season with salt, scatter over the parsley and serve immediately.
